This change is wrong, for subtle reasons. The purpose of taking the difference before squaring is that it's a lot more stable numerically. See e.g.: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Algorithms_for_calculating_variance
This is not a mere theoretical concern: it happens in very common scenarios.
